title: Jhin's fully assembled gun surprisingly looks very ionian.
body: And yeah, aww there is even a lucky red amulet hanging from it.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Solerian,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Exfx8HaO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-16T04:36:05.520+0000)
>
> Possibly because he's Ionian?

He said he has resentment against ionian tradition. So well i find it quite touching since he has a amulet to hope on.

It might be symbolic of what he thinks Ionia can achieve if they actually advance their culture. He resent Ionian tradition because it's stagnant, and with Whisper fully made perhaps he hopes to show what Ionia is actually capable of. Patriotism with a unique spin to it.
Can you give us a link to watch it from close? I seem not able to find it ^^
Thanks :D Indeed it's really something that would come from Ionia, kind of a spirit rifle :P
